channel.title: Bash on Zachary Loeber
channel.description: Recent content in Bash on Zachary Loeber

item.title: The Istio Rabbithole
item.description: Istio can be overwhelmingly complex but using the istio operator, helmfile, and local kubernetes in docker clusters, we can simplify the learning journey.

item.title: Azure Devops Automated Variable Groups
item.description: In this article I’ll cover how one can automate creating and updating ADO libraries (aka. variable groups) using pipeline as code.

item.title: Ado Keyvault Linked Var Groups
item.description: Azure DevOps keyvault linked variable groups are not easy to automate but it can be done.
